homeHeader.title: Launch, Expand, and Thrive in the UAE with One Nexuz’s Seamless Business Solutions
homeHeader.description: Without a trusted local sponsor, clear legal guidance, and a future-proof business plan, your UAE launch becomes costly guesswork. At One Nexuz, our team of seasoned business consultants and advisors removes the friction with our future-proof, all-in-one business solutions, from business plan preparation and feasibility studies to customs and company car registration. We simplify your setup and cut through the red tape to fast-track your time-to-market and unlock exciting networking opportunities.

leftSection_1.description: Simplify UAE company formation, elevate your online presence, drive web and foot traffic, and unleash your business’s potential with comprehensive business solutions.

leftSection_5.title: Receive Your Complete Growth Roadmap in 4 Steps

items.title: Book Your Free Consultation

items.title: Grow, Expand, and Thrive

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can a local sponsor take strategic decisions for my business?
items.answer: No, a local sponsor’s role is administrative, meaning you retain complete control over your business, including what decisions are made and how profits are distributed.

items.question: Can foreigners fully own a business in Dubai, UAE?
items.answer: Yes, you can enjoy full foreign ownership of your UAE business in Free Zones and most Mainland areas.

items.question: What do your market research & feasibility studies include?
items.answer: Our comprehensive market research and feasibility studies include in-depth analysis of market demand, competition, pricing, and financial feasibility to help you validate a product or service and make informed business decisions.

items.question: How does One Nexuz handle visa and executive travel?
items.answer: From visa application right down to relocation support, our experts manage all logistics, approvals, and compliance requirements for a seamless travel experience.

items.question: Can One Nexuz assist me in creating a business plan to secure a license?
items.answer: Yes, our experts specialise in creating personalised, future-proof, and legally sound business plans to help business owners and entrepreneurs secure a Mainland or Free Zone license.
